enWisdom: Etiquette is a reflection of the intellect

Wisdom: الْأَدَبُ فِي الْإِنْسَانِ كَشَجَرَةٍ أَصْلُهَا الْعَقْلُ
enWisdom: Good etiquette in a person is like a tree whose roots are the intellect
The best intelligence is [that which leads to] good etiquette

Wisdom: ذَكِّ عَقْلَكَ بِالْأَدَبِ كَمَا تُذَكَّى النَّارُ بِالْحَطَبِ
enWisdom: Kindle your intellect with etiquette just as you kindle fire with firewood
The rectitude of the intellect is [in] good etiquette

Wisdom: كُلُّ شَيْ‏ءٍ يَحْتَاجُ إِلَى الْعَقْلِ وَالْعَقْلُ يَحْتَاجُ إِلَى الْأَدَبِ
enWisdom: Everything requires intellect and intellect requires etiquette

Wisdom: مَنْ زَادَ أَدَبُهُ عَلَى عَقْلِهِ كَانَ الرَّاعِيَ بَيْنَ غَنَمٍ كَثِيرَةٍ
enWisdom: One whose etiquette augments his intellect is like a [lone] shepherd among many sheep
The best companion of the intellect is etiquette

Wisdom: لَا عَقْلَ لِمَنْ لَا أَدَبَ لَهُ
enWisdom: He who has no etiquette has no intelligence
